#summary The project's style guide for C++ code.

=C++ Style Guide=

This project adheres to the Google C++ Style Guide, with a few exceptions:
  * *class method names*: start with a capital letter and have a capital letter for each new word, with no underscores.

==Why Have a Style Guide?==

Check out the Background section of the [http://google-styleguide.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/cppguide.xml Google C++ Style Guide].
